ComicInfo.Summary: Hostile Takeover 1: Deadheads: Ordered by Rex Mundi to destroy Ultratech in New York, J.D. Hunt hires mercenary group The Solution to handle the problem. For insurance he sends Teknight II on a plane to New York to help them out. Night Man, who hitches a ride on the plane, uses New Yorkâ€™s sewers to gain access to the Ultratech building, but finds The Solution has beat him to it.
